price: 在今世和后世，我们都是你们的保护者。你们在乐园里将享受你们所爱好的一切，你们在乐园里将享受你们所要求的一切。
arabic: نَحۡنُ أَوۡلِيَآؤُكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَفِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۖ وَلَكُمۡ فِيهَا مَا تَشۡتَهِيٓ أَنفُسُكُمۡ وَلَكُمۡ فِيهَا مَا تَدَّعُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: naḥnu awliyāukum fī al-ḥayati al-dun'yā wafī al-ākhirati walakum fīhā mā tashtahī anfusukum walakum fīhā mā taddaʿūna
